name: HellFight [BETA]
description:
A game included both my very favorite genre: rogue-lite and soul-like with a twist.

Make sure you challenge the online leaderboard top!

This game is still in the very early process of development and still can be very adjustable about everything. So please tell me your thoughts about the game, feedback and suggestion will be applied almost immediately! 

Follow me and expect constant update of this game until it's final release.
